title: Let QSS build into an AP item
body: Sometimes you have to build QSS against a crowd control heavy team as an AP user.

replies.body:
Then build QSS against them.

Most games never reach full build (especially in this meta), so chances are you won't even have to lose gold selling it.

I've build QSS as an AP champ on more than one occasion. You don't need to finish it out and while it may not be completely cost effective, it's only 1300 gold and if that saves your life and keeps you from getting destroyed, then buying a cost inefficient item is better in the long run. Sell it for your 6th item and you'll be just fine through 90% of the game.

https://i.imgur.com/zlpmoTS.png

2 QSS a mercurial and a mickael plus a zonia in a team. painfull to play against ..

There's a reason there isn't the item for AP users - the majority of AP users focus on burst damage and giving them a way to escape CC when they in fact should just be able to time their ranged burst damage would mitigate the outplay potential you've got against them. It sucks for certain AP champions that focus on more damage over time like Cassiopeia but they usually have something in their kit to make it work.
